name: agent-economy
description: Example demonstrating agents paying other agents - a true agent-to-agent economy

scripts.go: pnpm exec tsx src/cli.ts run --task "Create a meme about Solana" --budget 1.0 --brand brands/memeputer.json
scripts.memeputer: pnpm exec tsx src/cli.ts run --task "Create a meme about Solana" --budget 1.0 --brand brands/memeputer.json
scripts.payai: pnpm exec tsx src/cli.ts run --task "Create a meme about Solana" --budget 1.0 --brand brands/payai.json
scripts.test: pnpm exec tsx src/cli.ts run --task "Create a meme about Solana" --budget 1.0
